cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
project("UGMMS")

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CXXFLAGS ${CXXFLAGS} "-m32")
set(CFLAGS ${CFLAGS} "-m32")

file(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES
	"src/*.cpp"
)

set(UGMMS_DETOURS_LIB "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/detours.lib" PARENT_SCOPE)
set(UGMMS_SOURCES ${SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(UGMMS_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include" PARENT_SCOPE)
